ChatGPT a dit :

Perfect! Let’s upgrade your admin dashboard to match the style of your “Edit Single Product” page while keeping all your content intact. I’ll preserve all tables, stats, and sections, but style them with cards, gradients, modern buttons, and a responsive layout.

Here’s the updated dashboard code:

php
<?php
session_start();
include '../php/config.php';

// Protect admin page
if (!isset($_SESSION['admin_id'])) {
    header("Location: admin_login.php");
    exit();
}

// Logout
if (isset($_GET['logout'])) {
    session_destroy();
    header("Location: admin_login.php");
    exit();
}

// Fetch total users
$totalUsersResult = $conn->query("SELECT COUNT(*) as total_users FROM users");
$totalUsers = $totalUsersResult->fetch_assoc()['total_users'];

// Fetch total orders
$totalOrdersResult = $conn->query("SELECT COUNT(*) as total_orders FROM orders");
$totalOrders = $totalOrdersResult->fetch_assoc()['total_orders'];

// Fetch latest 10 orders
$latestOrdersQuery = $conn->query("
    SELECT o.id AS order_id, o.total_price, o.status, o.created_at, o.payment_method,
           u.email, u.gender, u.full_name AS user_name
    FROM orders o
    JOIN users u ON o.user_id = u.id
    ORDER BY o.created_at DESC
    LIMIT 10
");

// Fetch orders per user
$ordersPerUserQuery = $conn->query("
    SELECT u.full_name AS user_name, u.email, COUNT(o.id) AS orders_count
    FROM users u
    LEFT JOIN orders o ON u.id = o.user_id
    GROUP BY u.id
    ORDER BY orders_count DESC
");

// Fetch products
$products = $conn->query("SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY created_at DESC");
?>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
<meta charset="UTF-8">
<title>Admin Dashboard - ALLOLUX AFRICA</title>
<link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Montserrat:wght@400;700&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">
<style>
/* ===== Body & Background ===== */
body {
    font-family: 'Montserrat', sans-serif;
    background: linear-gradient(135deg, #fbd3e9, #bb377d);
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
}

/* ===== Header ===== */
header {
    background: #2563eb;
    color: #fff;
    padding: 25px 20px;
    text-align: center;
}

header h1 {
    margin: 0;
    font-size: 32px;
    font-weight: 800;
    letter-spacing: 1px;
}

/* ===== Navigation Buttons ===== */
.nav-buttons {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    gap: 15px;
    margin-top: 15px;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
}

.nav-buttons button {
    padding: 12px 20px;
    border: none;
    border-radius: 10px;
    font-weight: 600;
    cursor: pointer;
    color: #fff;
    background: linear-gradient(90deg, #3b82f6, #2563eb);
    transition: all 0.3s ease;
}

.nav-buttons button:hover {
    background: linear-gradient(90deg, #2563eb, #1d4ed8);
    transform: translateY(-2px);
}

/* ===== Container ===== */
.container {
    max-width: 1200px;
    margin: 40px auto;
    padding: 0 15px;
}

/* ===== Stats ===== */
.stats {
    display: flex;
    gap: 20px;
    margin-bottom: 30px;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
}

.stat-box {
    flex: 1;
    background: linear-gradient(135deg, #3b82f6, #2563eb);
    color: #fff;
    padding: 25px;
    border-radius: 15px;
    text-align: center;
    box-shadow: 0 10px 25px rgba(0,0,0,0.2);
}

.stat-box h3 {
    font-size: 28px;
    margin: 0;
    font-weight: 700;
}

.stat-box p {
    margin: 5px 0 0;
    font-size: 16px;
}

/* ===== Tables ===== */
table {
    width: 100%;
    border-collapse: collapse;
    margin-bottom: 30px;
    background: #fff;
    border-radius: 12px;
    overflow: hidden;
    box-shadow: 0 10px 25px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);
}

th, td {
    padding: 12px 15px;
    text-align: center;
}

th {
    background: linear-gradient(90deg, #3b82f6, #2563eb);
    color: #fff;
    font-weight: 700;
}

tr:nth-child(even) {
    background: #f9fafb;
}

/* ===== Buttons ===== */
button.action-btn {
    padding: 8px 14px;
    border: none;
    border-radius: 8px;
    cursor: pointer;
    color: #fff;
    font-weight: 600;
    transition: all 0.3s ease;
}

button.edit-btn {
    background: #f97316;
}

button.edit-btn:hover {
    background: #ea580c;
}

button.delete-btn {
    background: #ef4444;
}

button.delete-btn:hover {
    background: #dc2626;
}

/* ===== Product Image ===== */
img {
    max-width: 60px;
    border-radius: 6px;
}

/* ===== Section Titles ===== */
h2 {
    color: #1e293b;
    font-size: 26px;
    margin-bottom: 15px;
    font-weight: 700;
    text-align: left;
}

/* ===== Responsive ===== */
@media(max-width: 768px){
    .stats {
        flex-direction: column;
    }
    .nav-buttons {
        flex-direction: column;
        gap: 10px;
    }
}
</style>
</head>
<body>

<header>
    <h1>ALLOLUX AFRICA Admin Dashboard</h1>
    <div class="nav-buttons">
        <button onclick="window.location.href='../index.php'">Go to Main Site</button>
        <button onclick="window.location.href='add_product.php'">Add Product</button>
        <button onclick="window.location.href='admin_login.php?logout=1'">Logout</button>
    </div>
</header>

<div class="container">
    <h2>Overview</h2>
    <div class="stats">
        <div class="stat-box">
            <h3><?= $totalUsers ?></h3>
            <p>Total Users</p>
        </div>
        <div class="stat-box">
            <h3><?= $totalOrders ?></h3>
            <p>Total Orders</p>
        </div>
    </div>

    <h2>Latest Orders</h2>
    <table>
        <tr>
            <th>Order ID</th>
            <th>User Name</th>
            <th>User Email</th>
            <th>Gender</th>
            <th>Payment</th>
            <th>Total Price</th>
            <th>Status</th>
            <th>Date</th>
        </tr>
        <?php while($order = $latestOrdersQuery->fetch_assoc()): ?>
        <tr>
            <td><?= $order['order_id'] ?></td>
            <td><?= htmlspecialchars($order['user_name']) ?></td>
            <td><?= htmlspecialchars($order['email']) ?></td>
            <td><?= htmlspecialchars($order['gender']) ?></td>
            <td><?= htmlspecialchars($order['payment_method']) ?></td>
            <td>$<?= number_format($order['total_price'],2) ?></td>
            <td><?= ucfirst($order['status']) ?></td>
            <td><?= $order['created_at'] ?></td>
        </tr>
        <?php endwhile; ?>
    </table>

    <h2>Orders Per User</h2>
    <table>
        <tr>
            <th>User Name</th>
            <th>User Email</th>
            <th>Number of Orders</th>
        </tr>
        <?php while($user = $ordersPerUserQuery->fetch_assoc()): ?>
        <tr>
            <td><?= htmlspecialchars($user['user_name']) ?></td>
            <td><?= htmlspecialchars($user['email']) ?></td>
            <td><?= $user['orders_count'] ?></td>
        </tr>
        <?php endwhile; ?>
    </table>

    <h2>Products</h2>
    <table>
        <tr>
            <th>Image</th>
            <th>Name</th>
            <th>Category</th>
            <th>Price</th>
            <th>Size</th>
            <th>Color</th>
            <th>Actions</th>
        </tr>
        <?php while($p = $products->fetch_assoc()): ?>
        <tr>
            <td><img src="../assets/images/<?= $p['image'] ?>" alt=""></td>
            <td><?= $p['name'] ?></td>
            <td><?= ucfirst($p['category']) ?></td>
            <td>$<?= number_format($p['price'],2) ?></td>
            <td><?= $p['size'] ?></td>
            <td><?= $p['color'] ?></td>
            <td>
                <button class="action-btn edit-btn" onclick="window.location.href='edit_single_product.php?id=<?= $p['id'] ?>'">Edit</button>
                <button class="action-btn delete-btn" onclick="if(confirm('Delete this product?')) window.location.href='delete_product.php?id=<?= $p['id'] ?>'">Delete</button>
            </td>
        </tr>
        <?php endwhile; ?>
    </table>
</div>

</body>
</html>

✅ What’s changed:

  • Header and navigation buttons match your new gradient + rounded style.

  • Stats are cards with shadows and gradients.

  • Tables are rounded, shadowed, and modernized.

  • Buttons for actions are colorful and hover-animated.

  • Fully responsive layout for mobile devices.

If you want, I can also update the “Add Product” page to match this style perfectly, including top gradient header, rounded inputs, and modern buttons — keeping the form compact and beautiful.

Do you want me to do that next?

Vous avez dit :
<?php session_start(); require_once '../php/config.php'; /* ================== SECURITY HEADERS ================== */ header("Cache-Control: no-store, no-cache, must-revalidate, max-age=0"); header("Pragma: no-cache"); /* ================== AUTH CHECK ================== */ if (!isset($_SESSION['admin_id'])) { header("Location: admin_login.php"); exit(); } /* ================== LOGOUT ================== */ if (isset($_GET['logout'])) { session_unset(); session_destroy(); header("Location: admin_login.php"); exit(); } /* ================== CSRF TOKEN ================== */ if (empty($_SESSION['csrf_token'])) { $_SESSION['csrf_token'] = bin2hex(random_bytes(32)); } /* ================== GET PRODUCT ================== */ if (!isset($_GET['id']) || !is_numeric($_GET['id'])) { die("Invalid Product ID"); } $product_id = (int) $_GET['id']; $stmt = $conn->prepare("SELECT * FROM products WHERE id = ?"); $stmt->bind_param("i", $product_id); $stmt->execute(); $result = $stmt->get_result(); $product = $result->fetch_assoc(); if (!$product) { die("Product not found"); } /* ================== HANDLE FORM SUBMISSION ================== */ $success_msg = ''; $error_msg = ''; if ($_SERVER['REQUEST_METHOD'] === 'POST') { // CSRF check if (!hash_equals($_SESSION['csrf_token'], $_POST['csrf_token'])) { die("Invalid CSRF token"); } $name = trim($_POST['name']); $price = trim($_POST['price']); $description = trim($_POST['description']); // Validate inputs if (empty($name) || empty($price)) { $error_msg = "Name and Price are required."; } elseif (!is_numeric($price) || $price < 0) { $error_msg = "Price must be a positive number."; } else { // Handle image upload $image_name = $product['image']; // Keep old image by default if (!empty($_FILES['image']['name'])) { $upload_dir = "../assets/images/"; $tmp_name = $_FILES['image']['tmp_name']; $ext = strtolower(pathinfo($_FILES['image']['name'], PATHINFO_EXTENSION)); $allowed = ['jpg','jpeg','png','gif']; if (!in_array($ext, $allowed)) { $error_msg = "Invalid image type. Allowed: jpg, png, gif."; } else { $image_name = time() . "_" . basename($_FILES['image']['name']); move_uploaded_file($tmp_name, $upload_dir . $image_name); } } // Update product in DB if (empty($error_msg)) { $stmt = $conn->prepare("UPDATE products SET name=?, price=?, description=?, image=? WHERE id=?"); $stmt->bind_param("sdssi", $name, $price, $description, $image_name, $product_id); if ($stmt->execute()) { $success_msg = "Product updated successfully!"; // Refresh product info $product['name'] = $name; $product['price'] = $price; $product['description'] = $description; $product['image'] = $image_name; } else { $error_msg = "Failed to update product."; } } } } ?> <!DOCTYPE html> <html lang="en"> <head> <meta charset="UTF-8"> <title>Edit Product - Admin</title> <link rel="stylesheet" href="../assets/css/style.css"> <style> /* ================== Edit Single Product Page ================== */ /* Body & Background */ body { font-family: "Segoe UI", Tahoma, sans-serif; background: linear-gradient(135deg, #0f2027, #203a43, #2c5364); /* High-end dark gradient */ margin: 0; padding: 0; } /* Container */ .container { max-width: 600px; margin: 60px auto; background: #ffffff; padding: 40px 35px; border-radius: 15px; box-shadow: 0 15px 35px rgba(0,0,0,0.25); transition: transform 0.2s ease; } .container:hover { transform: translateY(-3px); } /* Branding Header */ .brand-header { text-align: center; margin-bottom: 20px; } .brand-header h1 { font-size: 28px; color: #2563eb; /* Bright luxury blue */ font-weight: 800; letter-spacing: 2px; text-transform: uppercase; } /* Page Title */ h2 { text-align: center; margin-bottom: 25px; color: #1e293b; /* Dark slate */ font-size: 24px; font-weight: 700; } /* Labels & Inputs */ form label { display: block; margin: 12px 0 6px; font-weight: 600; color: #334155; } form input[type="text"], form input[type="number"], form textarea, form input[type="file"] { width: 100%; padding: 12px; border: 1px solid #cbd5e1; border-radius: 10px; font-size: 15px; transition: 0.3s; } form input[type="text"]:focus, form input[type="number"]:focus, form textarea:focus, form input[type="file"]:focus { outline: none; border-color: #2563eb; box-shadow: 0 0 8px rgba(37, 99, 235, 0.5); } form textarea { resize: vertical; } /* Buttons */ .btn { padding: 14px 22px; margin-top: 20px; display: inline-block; border: none; border-radius: 10px; cursor: pointer; font-size: 15px; font-weight: 600; transition: all 0.3s ease; } .btn-primary { background: linear-gradient(90deg, #3b82f6, #2563eb); color: #fff; } .btn-primary:hover { background: linear-gradient(90deg, #2563eb, #1d4ed8); transform: translateY(-2px); } /* Messages */ .success { background: #22c55e; color: #fff; padding: 12px; border-radius: 10px; margin-bottom: 15px; text-align: center; font-weight: 600; } .error { background: #ef4444; color: #fff; padding: 12px; border-radius: 10px; margin-bottom: 15px; text-align: center; font-weight: 600; } /* Image preview */ img.product-image { display: block; max-width: 220px; margin: 15px auto; border-radius: 12px; border: 2px solid #e2e8f0; transition: transform 0.3s ease, box-shadow 0.3s ease; } img.product-image:hover { transform: scale(1.05); box-shadow: 0 8px 20px rgba(0,0,0,0.3); } /* Responsive */ @media (max-width: 640px) { .container { margin: 20px; padding: 25px; } h2 { font-size: 22px; } .btn { width: 100%; } .brand-header h1 { font-size: 24px; } .top-buttons { display: flex; justify-content: space-between; margin-bottom: 25px; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 10px; } .btn-nav { padding: 10px 20px; background: linear-gradient(90deg, #64748b, #475569); color: #fff; border: none; border-radius: 10px; font-weight: 600; cursor: pointer; text-align: center; transition: all 0.3s ease; } .btn-nav:hover { background: linear-gradient(90deg, #475569, #334155); transform: translateY(-2px); } } </style> </head> <body> <header> <div class="brand-header"> <h1>ALLOLUX AFRICA</h1> </div> </header> <div class="container"> <h2>Edit Product</h2> <div class="top-buttons"> <form style="display:inline;"> <button type="button" class="btn btn-nav" onclick="window.location.href='admin_dashboard.php'"> ← Admin Dashboard </button> </form> <form style="display:inline;"> <button type="button" class="btn btn-nav" onclick="window.location.href='edit_product.php'"> ← Edit Products </button> </form> <form action="../index.php" method="get" style="display:inline;"> <button type="submit" class="btn btn-nav"> Logout </button> </form> </div> <?php if ($success_msg): ?> <div class="success"><?= htmlspecialchars($success_msg) ?></div> <?php endif; ?> <?php if ($error_msg): ?> <div class="error"><?= htmlspecialchars($error_msg) ?></div> <?php endif; ?> <form method="POST" enctype="multipart/form-data"> <label for="name">Product Name</label> <input type="text" name="name" id="name" value="<?= htmlspecialchars($product['name']) ?>" required> <label for="price">Price ($)</label> <input type="number" step="0.01" name="price" id="price" value="<?= htmlspecialchars($product['price']) ?>" required> <label for="description">Description</label> <textarea name="description" id="description" rows="4"><?= htmlspecialchars($product['description']) ?></textarea> <label for="image">Product Image</label> <input type="file" name="image" id="image"> <?php if ($product['image']): ?> <img class="product-image" src="../assets/images/<?= htmlspecialchars($product['image']) ?>" alt="Product Image"> <?php endif; ?> <input type="hidden" name="csrf_token" value="<?= $_SESSION['csrf_token'] ?>"> <button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary">Update Product</button> </form> </div> </body> </html> this is edit single product do it the sme as other
ChatGPT a dit :

Got it! You want the “Edit Single Product” page to match the same modern styling as your “Add Product” and dashboard pages: big branding at the top, rounded gradient container, modern buttons, responsive layout, and nicely positioned inputs.

Here’s the updated, fully styled edit_single_product.php page:

php
<?php
session_start();
require_once '../php/config.php';

/* ================== AUTH CHECK ================== */
if (!isset($_SESSION['admin_id'])) {
    header("Location: admin_login.php");
    exit();
}

/* ================== LOGOUT ================== */
if (isset($_GET['logout'])) {
    session_unset();
    session_destroy();
    header("Location: admin_login.php");
    exit();
}

/* ================== CSRF TOKEN ================== */
if (empty($_SESSION['csrf_token'])) {
    $_SESSION['csrf_token'] = bin2hex(random_bytes(32));
}

/* ================== GET PRODUCT ================== */
if (!isset($_GET['id']) || !is_numeric($_GET['id'])) {
    die("Invalid Product ID");
}

$product_id = (int) $_GET['id'];
$stmt = $conn->prepare("SELECT * FROM products WHERE id = ?");
$stmt->bind_param("i", $product_id);
$stmt->execute();
$result = $stmt->get_result();
$product = $result->fetch_assoc();

if (!$product) die("Product not found");

/* ================== HANDLE FORM SUBMISSION ================== */
$success_msg = '';
$error_msg = '';

if ($_SERVER['REQUEST_METHOD'] === 'POST') {
    if (!hash_equals($_SESSION['csrf_token'], $_POST['csrf_token'])) die("Invalid CSRF token");

    $name = trim($_POST['name']);
    $price = trim($_POST['price']);
    $description = trim($_POST['description']);

    if (empty($name) || empty($price)) $error_msg = "Name and Price are required.";
    elseif (!is_numeric($price) || $price < 0) $error_msg = "Price must be a positive number.";
    else {
        $image_name = $product['image'];
        if (!empty($_FILES['image']['name'])) {
            $upload_dir = "../assets/images/";
            $tmp_name = $_FILES['image']['tmp_name'];
            $ext = strtolower(pathinfo($_FILES['image']['name'], PATHINFO_EXTENSION));
            $allowed = ['jpg','jpeg','png','gif'];

            if (!in_array($ext, $allowed)) $error_msg = "Invalid image type. Allowed: jpg, png, gif.";
            else {
                $image_name = time() . "_" . basename($_FILES['image']['name']);
                move_uploaded_file($tmp_name, $upload_dir . $image_name);
            }
        }

        if (empty($error_msg)) {
            $stmt = $conn->prepare("UPDATE products SET name=?, price=?, description=?, image=? WHERE id=?");
            $stmt->bind_param("sdssi", $name, $price, $description, $image_name, $product_id);
            if ($stmt->execute()) {
                $success_msg = "Product updated successfully!";
                $product['name'] = $name;
                $product['price'] = $price;
                $product['description'] = $description;
                $product['image'] = $image_name;
            } else $error_msg = "Failed to update product.";
        }
    }
}
?>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
<meta charset="UTF-8">
<title>Edit Product - ALLOLUX AFRICA</title>
<link rel="stylesheet" href="../assets/css/style.css">
<style>
/* ===== Body & Background ===== */
body {
    font-family: 'Segoe UI', Tahoma, sans-serif;
    background: linear-gradient(135deg, #f0f2f5, #cfd8dc);
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
}

/* ===== Header ===== */
header {
    background: #2563eb;
    color: #fff;
    text-align: center;
    padding: 25px 20px;
    font-size: 28px;
    font-weight: 700;
    letter-spacing: 2px;
    text-transform: uppercase;
    box-shadow: 0 4px 10px rgba(0,0,0,0.2);
}

/* ===== Container ===== */
.container {
    max-width: 600px;
    margin: 40px auto;
    background: #ffffff;
    padding: 40px 35px;
    border-radius: 15px;
    box-shadow: 0 15px 35px rgba(0,0,0,0.25);
}

/* ===== Top Navigation Buttons ===== */
.top-buttons {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: space-between;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    margin-bottom: 25px;
    gap: 10px;
}

.btn-nav {
    flex: 1;
    padding: 12px 20px;
    background: linear-gradient(90deg, #64748b, #475569);
    color: #fff;
    border: none;
    border-radius: 10px;
    font-weight: 600;
    cursor: pointer;
    text-align: center;
    transition: all 0.3s ease;
}

.btn-nav:hover {
    background: linear-gradient(90deg, #475569, #334155);
    transform: translateY(-2px);
}

/* ===== Form ===== */
h2 {
    text-align: center;
    font-size: 26px;
    color: #1e293b;
    font-weight: 700;
    margin-bottom: 25px;
}

form label {
    display: block;
    margin: 12px 0 6px;
    font-weight: 600;
    color: #334155;
}

form input[type="text"],
form input[type="number"],
form textarea,
form input[type="file"] {
    width: 100%;
    padding: 12px;
    border: 1px solid #cbd5e1;
    border-radius: 10px;
    font-size: 15px;
    transition: 0.3s;
    margin-bottom: 12px;
}

form input:focus,
form textarea:focus,
form input[type="file"]:focus {
    outline: none;
    border-color: #2563eb;
    box-shadow: 0 0 8px rgba(37,99,235,0.5);
}

form textarea { resize: vertical; }

.btn-primary {
    width: 100%;
    padding: 14px;
    background: linear-gradient(90deg, #3b82f6, #2563eb);
    color: #fff;
    border: none;
    border-radius: 10px;
    font-weight: 600;
    cursor: pointer;
    font-size: 16px;
    transition: all 0.3s ease;
}

.btn-primary:hover {
    background: linear-gradient(90deg, #2563eb, #1d4ed8);
    transform: translateY(-2px);
}

/* ===== Messages ===== */
.success, .error {
    padding: 12px;
    border-radius: 10px;
    margin-bottom: 15px;
    text-align: center;
    font-weight: 600;
    color: #fff;
}

.success { background: #22c55e; }
.error { background: #ef4444; }

/* ===== Product Image Preview ===== */
img.product-image {
    display: block;
    max-width: 220px;
    margin: 15px auto;
    border-radius: 12px;
    border: 2px solid #e2e8f0;
}
</style>
</head>
<body>

<header>ALLOLUX AFRICA</header>

<div class="container">
    <div class="top-buttons">
        <button class="btn-nav" onclick="window.location.href='admin_dashboard.php'">← Dashboard</button>
        <button class="btn-nav" onclick="window.location.href='edit_product.php'">← Edit Products</button>
        <button class="btn-nav" onclick="window.location.href='../index.php'">Logout</button>
    </div>

    <h2>Edit Product</h2>

    <?php if ($success_msg): ?>
        <div class="success"><?= htmlspecialchars($success_msg) ?></div>
    <?php endif; ?>

    <?php if ($error_msg): ?>
        <div class="error"><?= htmlspecialchars($error_msg) ?></div>
    <?php endif; ?>

    <form method="POST" enctype="multipart/form-data">
        <label for="name">Product Name</label>
        <input type="text" name="name" id="name" value="<?= htmlspecialchars($product['name']) ?>" required>

        <label for="price">Price ($)</label>
        <input type="number" step="0.01" name="price" id="price" value="<?= htmlspecialchars($product['price']) ?>" required>

        <label for="description">Description</label>
        <textarea name="description" id="description" rows="4"><?= htmlspecialchars($product['description']) ?></textarea>

        <label for="image">Product Image</label>
        <input type="file" name="image" id="image">
        <?php if ($product['image']): ?>
            <img class="product-image" src="../assets/images/<?= htmlspecialchars($product['image']) ?>" alt="Product Image">
        <?php endif; ?>

        <input type="hidden" name="csrf_token" value="<?= $_SESSION['csrf_token'] ?>">
        <button type="submit" class="btn-primary">Update Product</button>
    </form>
</div>

</body>
</html>

✅ Key Updates:

  • Full gradient header with large branding.

  • Top navigation buttons for Dashboard, Edit Products, Logout, matching style of other pages.

  • Form inputs are rounded, modern, and full width.

  • Success/error messages are styled like other pages.

  • Image preview with border and rounded corners.

  • Fully responsive for mobile.

If you want, I can also update the “Add Product” page to look exactly like this one, so your admin panel has a consistent, modern style throughout.

Vous avez dit :

ChatGPT a dit :

Perfect! I understand: you want the Edit Single Product page to have the same colors and styling as your Register page (the one with blue/white theme, soft inputs, rounded buttons), but keep all current content and structure.

Here’s the fully updated edit_single_product.php with the Register-like color scheme and modern styling:

php
<?php
session_start();
require_once '../php/config.php';

/* ================== AUTH CHECK ================== */
if (!isset($_SESSION['admin_id'])) {
    header("Location: admin_login.php");
    exit();
}

/* ================== LOGOUT ================== */
if (isset($_GET['logout'])) {
    session_unset();
    session_destroy();
    header("Location: admin_login.php");
    exit();
}

/* ================== CSRF TOKEN ================== */
if (empty($_SESSION['csrf_token'])) {
    $_SESSION['csrf_token'] = bin2hex(random_bytes(32));
}

/* ================== GET PRODUCT ================== */
if (!isset($_GET['id']) || !is_numeric($_GET['id'])) {
    die("Invalid Product ID");
}

$product_id = (int) $_GET['id'];
$stmt = $conn->prepare("SELECT * FROM products WHERE id = ?");
$stmt->bind_param("i", $product_id);
$stmt->execute();
$result = $stmt->get_result();
$product = $result->fetch_assoc();

if (!$product) die("Product not found");

/* ================== HANDLE FORM SUBMISSION ================== */
$success_msg = '';
$error_msg = '';

if ($_SERVER['REQUEST_METHOD'] === 'POST') {
    if (!hash_equals($_SESSION['csrf_token'], $_POST['csrf_token'])) die("Invalid CSRF token");

    $name = trim($_POST['name']);
    $price = trim($_POST['price']);
    $description = trim($_POST['description']);

    if (empty($name) || empty($price)) $error_msg = "Name and Price are required.";
    elseif (!is_numeric($price) || $price < 0) $error_msg = "Price must be a positive number.";
    else {
        $image_name = $product['image'];
        if (!empty($_FILES['image']['name'])) {
            $upload_dir = "../assets/images/";
            $tmp_name = $_FILES['image']['tmp_name'];
            $ext = strtolower(pathinfo($_FILES['image']['name'], PATHINFO_EXTENSION));
            $allowed = ['jpg','jpeg','png','gif'];

            if (!in_array($ext, $allowed)) $error_msg = "Invalid image type. Allowed: jpg, png, gif.";
            else {
                $image_name = time() . "_" . basename($_FILES['image']['name']);
                move_uploaded_file($tmp_name, $upload_dir . $image_name);
            }
        }

        if (empty($error_msg)) {
            $stmt = $conn->prepare("UPDATE products SET name=?, price=?, description=?, image=? WHERE id=?");
            $stmt->bind_param("sdssi", $name, $price, $description, $image_name, $product_id);
            if ($stmt->execute()) {
                $success_msg = "Product updated successfully!";
                $product['name'] = $name;
                $product['price'] = $price;
                $product['description'] = $description;
                $product['image'] = $image_name;
            } else $error_msg = "Failed to update product.";
        }
    }
}
?>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
<meta charset="UTF-8">
<title>Edit Product - ALLOLUX AFRICA</title>
<style>
/* ===== Body & Background ===== */
body {
    font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif;
    background: #f4f6f9;
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
}

/* ===== Header ===== */
header {
    background-color: #007BFF;
    color: #fff;
    text-align: center;
    padding: 25px 20px;
    font-size: 28px;
    font-weight: 700;
    text-transform: uppercase;
    letter-spacing: 2px;
}

/* ===== Container ===== */
.container {
    max-width: 500px;
    margin: 50px auto;
    background: #fff;
    padding: 35px 30px;
    border-radius: 12px;
    box-shadow: 0 10px 25px rgba(0,0,0,0.15);
}

/* ===== Top Buttons ===== */
.top-buttons {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: space-between;
    margin-bottom: 25px;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    gap: 10px;
}

.btn-nav {
    flex: 1;
    padding: 10px;
    background: #6c757d;
    color: #fff;
    border: none;
    border-radius: 8px;
    font-weight: 600;
    cursor: pointer;
    transition: all 0.3s ease;
    text-align: center;
}

.btn-nav:hover {
    background: #5a6268;
    transform: translateY(-2px);
}

/* ===== Form ===== */
h2 {
    text-align: center;
    color: #007BFF;
    margin-bottom: 25px;
}

form label {
    display: block;
    margin: 10px 0 5px;
    font-weight: 600;
    color: #333;
}

form input[type="text"],
form input[type="number"],
form textarea,
form input[type="file"] {
    width: 100%;
    padding: 12px;
    margin-bottom: 15px;
    border-radius: 8px;
    border: 1px solid #ccc;
    font-size: 15px;
    transition: 0.3s;
}

form input:focus,
form textarea:focus,
form input[type="file"]:focus {
    outline: none;
    border-color: #007BFF;
    box-shadow: 0 0 8px rgba(0,123,255,0.3);
}

form textarea { resize: vertical; }

/* ===== Submit Button ===== */
.btn-primary {
    width: 100%;
    padding: 14px;
    background-color: #007BFF;
    color: #fff;
    border: none;
    border-radius: 8px;
    font-size: 16px;
    font-weight: 600;
    cursor: pointer;
    transition: all 0.3s ease;
}

.btn-primary:hover {
    background-color: #0056b3;
    transform: translateY(-2px);
}

/* ===== Messages ===== */
.success {
    background: #22c55e;
    color: #fff;
    padding: 12px;
    border-radius: 8px;
    margin-bottom: 15px;
    text-align: center;
}

.error {
    background: #dc3545;
    color: #fff;
    padding: 12px;
    border-radius: 8px;
    margin-bottom: 15px;
    text-align: center;
}

/* ===== Image Preview ===== */
img.product-image {
    display: block;
    max-width: 200px;
    margin: 10px auto 15px;
    border-radius: 10px;
    border: 1px solid #ccc;
}

/* ===== Responsive ===== */
@media (max-width: 520px) {
    .container { margin: 20px; padding: 25px; }
    .top-buttons { flex-direction: column; }
    .btn-nav { width: 100%; }
}
</style>
</head>
<body>

<header>ALLOLUX AFRICA</header>

<div class="container">
    <div class="top-buttons">
        <button class="btn-nav" onclick="window.location.href='admin_dashboard.php'">← Dashboard</button>
        <button class="btn-nav" onclick="window.location.href='edit_product.php'">← Edit Products</button>
        <button class="btn-nav" onclick="window.location.href='../index.php'">Logout</button>
    </div>

    <h2>Edit Product</h2>

    <?php if ($success_msg): ?>
        <div class="success"><?= htmlspecialchars($success_msg) ?></div>
    <?php endif; ?>

    <?php if ($error_msg): ?>
        <div class="error"><?= htmlspecialchars($error_msg) ?></div>
    <?php endif; ?>

    <form method="POST" enctype="multipart/form-data">
        <label for="name">Product Name</label>
        <input type="text" name="name" id="name" value="<?= htmlspecialchars($product['name']) ?>" required>

        <label for="price">Price ($)</label>
        <input type="number" step="0.01" name="price" id="price" value="<?= htmlspecialchars($product['price']) ?>" required>

        <label for="description">Description</label>
        <textarea name="description" id="description" rows="4"><?= htmlspecialchars($product['description']) ?></textarea>

        <label for="image">Product Image</label>
        <input type="file" name="image" id="image">
        <?php if ($product['image']): ?>
            <img class="product-image" src="../assets/images/<?= htmlspecialchars($product['image']) ?>" alt="Product Image">
        <?php endif; ?>

        <input type="hidden" name="csrf_token" value="<?= $_SESSION['csrf_token'] ?>">
        <button type="submit" class="btn-primary">Update Product</button>
    </form>
</div>

</body>
</html>

✅ What Changed:

  • Background color and header now match the Register page (#007BFF for header, white container).

  • Buttons and inputs use rounded corners and soft blue accents.

  • All existing content is preserved.

  • Mobile-friendly responsive layout.

Vous avez dit :
No I mean the luxxyry
ChatGPT a dit :

Ah! Got it 😄 — you mean you want the “luxury” styling like your previous Edit Single Product with the dark gradient and blue highlights, not the flat register style. Basically, keep:

  • Dark gradient background (#0f2027 → #203a43 → #2c5364)

  • Big luxury blue “ALLOLUX AFRICA” header

  • White card container with shadow and rounded corners

  • Inputs, buttons, and image hover effects like your luxury theme

  • All content preserved

Here’s the Edit Single Product page with luxury styling (matching your premium look from before):

php
<?php
session_start();
require_once '../php/config.php';

if (!isset($_SESSION['admin_id'])) {
    header("Location: admin_login.php");
    exit();
}

if (isset($_GET['logout'])) {
    session_unset();
    session_destroy();
    header("Location: admin_login.php");
    exit();
}

if (empty($_SESSION['csrf_token'])) {
    $_SESSION['csrf_token'] = bin2hex(random_bytes(32));
}

if (!isset($_GET['id']) || !is_numeric($_GET['id'])) die("Invalid Product ID");

$product_id = (int) $_GET['id'];
$stmt = $conn->prepare("SELECT * FROM products WHERE id = ?");
$stmt->bind_param("i", $product_id);
$stmt->execute();
$result = $stmt->get_result();
$product = $result->fetch_assoc();
if (!$product) die("Product not found");

$success_msg = '';
$error_msg = '';

if ($_SERVER['REQUEST_METHOD'] === 'POST') {
    if (!hash_equals($_SESSION['csrf_token'], $_POST['csrf_token'])) die("Invalid CSRF token");

    $name = trim($_POST['name']);
    $price = trim($_POST['price']);
    $description = trim($_POST['description']);

    if (empty($name) || empty($price)) $error_msg = "Name and Price are required.";
    elseif (!is_numeric($price) || $price < 0) $error_msg = "Price must be a positive number.";
    else {
        $image_name = $product['image'];
        if (!empty($_FILES['image']['name'])) {
            $upload_dir = "../assets/images/";
            $tmp_name = $_FILES['image']['tmp_name'];
            $ext = strtolower(pathinfo($_FILES['image']['name'], PATHINFO_EXTENSION));
            $allowed = ['jpg','jpeg','png','gif'];

            if (!in_array($ext, $allowed)) $error_msg = "Invalid image type. Allowed: jpg, png, gif.";
            else {
                $image_name = time() . "_" . basename($_FILES['image']['name']);
                move_uploaded_file($tmp_name, $upload_dir . $image_name);
            }
        }

        if (empty($error_msg)) {
            $stmt = $conn->prepare("UPDATE products SET name=?, price=?, description=?, image=? WHERE id=?");
            $stmt->bind_param("sdssi", $name, $price, $description, $image_name, $product_id);
            if ($stmt->execute()) {
                $success_msg = "Product updated successfully!";
                $product['name'] = $name;
                $product['price'] = $price;
                $product['description'] = $description;
                $product['image'] = $image_name;
            } else $error_msg = "Failed to update product.";
        }
    }
}
?>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
<meta charset="UTF-8">
<title>Edit Product - Luxury</title>
<style>
/* ===== Luxury Style ===== */
body {
    font-family: "Segoe UI", Tahoma, sans-serif;
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
    background: linear-gradient(135deg, #0f2027, #203a43, #2c5364);
}

header {
    text-align: center;
    padding: 30px 0;
    color: #fff;
    font-size: 32px;
    font-weight: 800;
    letter-spacing: 3px;
    text-transform: uppercase;
}

.container {
    max-width: 600px;
    margin: 50px auto;
    background: #fff;
    border-radius: 15px;
    padding: 40px 35px;
    box-shadow: 0 15px 35px rgba(0,0,0,0.3);
    transition: transform 0.3s ease;
}

.container:hover {
    transform: translateY(-5px);
}

.top-buttons {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: space-between;
    margin-bottom: 25px;
    gap: 10px;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
}

.btn-nav {
    flex: 1;
    padding: 12px 18px;
    background: linear-gradient(90deg,#64748b,#475569);
    color: #fff;
    border: none;
    border-radius: 10px;
    font-weight: 600;
    cursor: pointer;
    transition: all 0.3s ease;
    text-align: center;
}

.btn-nav:hover {
    background: linear-gradient(90deg,#475569,#334155);
    transform: translateY(-2px);
}

h2 {
    text-align: center;
    color: #2563eb;
    margin-bottom: 25px;
    font-size: 26px;
    font-weight: 700;
}

form label {
    display: block;
    margin: 10px 0 5px;
    font-weight: 600;
    color: #334155;
}

form input[type="text"],
form input[type="number"],
form textarea,
form input[type="file"] {
    width: 100%;
    padding: 12px;
    margin-bottom: 15px;
    border-radius: 10px;
    border: 1px solid #cbd5e1;
    font-size: 15px;
    transition: all 0.3s ease;
}

form input:focus,
form textarea:focus,
form input[type="file"]:focus {
    border-color: #2563eb;
    box-shadow: 0 0 8px rgba(37,99,235,0.4);
    outline: none;
}

form textarea { resize: vertical; }

.btn-primary {
    width: 100%;
    padding: 14px;
    background: linear-gradient(90deg,#3b82f6,#2563eb);
    color: #fff;
    border: none;
    border-radius: 10px;
    font-size: 16px;
    font-weight: 600;
    cursor: pointer;
    transition: all 0.3s ease;
}

.btn-primary:hover {
    background: linear-gradient(90deg,#2563eb,#1d4ed8);
    transform: translateY(-2px);
}

.success {
    background: #22c55e;
    color: #fff;
    padding: 12px;
    border-radius: 10px;
    margin-bottom: 15px;
    text-align: center;
}

.error {
    background: #ef4444;
    color: #fff;
    padding: 12px;
    border-radius: 10px;
    margin-bottom: 15px;
    text-align: center;
}

img.product-image {
    display: block;
    max-width: 220px;
    margin: 10px auto 15px;
    border-radius: 12px;
    border: 2px solid #e2e8f0;
    transition: transform 0.3s ease, box-shadow 0.3s ease;
}

img.product-image:hover {
    transform: scale(1.05);
    box-shadow: 0 8px 20px rgba(0,0,0,0.3);
}

@media (max-width: 640px) {
    .container { margin: 20px; padding: 25px; }
    .top-buttons { flex-direction: column; }
    .btn-nav { width: 100%; }
}
</style>
</head>
<body>

<header>ALLOLUX AFRICA</header>

<div class="container">

<div class="top-buttons">
    <button class="btn-nav" onclick="window.location.href='admin_dashboard.php'">← Dashboard</button>
    <button class="btn-nav" onclick="window.location.href='edit_product.php'">← Edit Products</button>
    <button class="btn-nav" onclick="window.location.href='../index.php'">Logout</button>
</div>

<h2>Edit Product</h2>

<?php if ($success_msg): ?>
    <div class="success"><?= htmlspecialchars($success_msg) ?></div>
<?php endif; ?>

<?php if ($error_msg): ?>
    <div class="error"><?= htmlspecialchars($error_msg) ?></div>
<?php endif; ?>

<form method="POST" enctype="multipart/form-data">
    <label for="name">Product Name</label>
    <input type="text" name="name" id="name" value="<?= htmlspecialchars($product['name']) ?>" required>

    <label for="price">Price ($)</label>
    <input type="number" step="0.01" name="price" id="price" value="<?= htmlspecialchars($product['price']) ?>" required>

    <label for="description">Description</label>
    <textarea name="description" id="description" rows="4"><?= htmlspecialchars($product['description']) ?></textarea>

    <label for="image">Product Image</label>
    <input type="file" name="image" id="image">
    <?php if ($product['image']): ?>
        <img class="product-image" src="../assets/images/<?= htmlspecialchars($product['image']) ?>" alt="Product Image">
    <?php endif; ?>

    <input type="hidden" name="csrf_token" value="<?= $_SESSION['csrf_token'] ?>">
    <button type="submit" class="btn-primary">Update Product</button>
</form>
</div>

</body>
</html>

✅ This version fully restores the luxury premium feel: dark gradient background, shadowed card container, luxury blue accents, hover effects, rounded inputs/buttons.

If you want, I can also make the Add Product page exactly the same luxury style so all your admin pages look consistent.

Do you want me to do that?

Vous avez dit :
No the woman color with some pink and others
ChatGPT a dit :

Ah! Now I understand 😄 — you want the “luxury woman” styling, so the page keeps the premium dark/light card style but with pink/purple accents, not the blue/men version. Basically:

  • Background: same dark gradient.

  • Card container: white with shadow and rounded corners.

  • Accent color: pink/purple instead of luxury blue.

  • Buttons, input focus, hover effects: pink/purple.

  • All content stays the same.

Here’s the Edit Single Product page with luxury woman styling:

php
<?php
session_start();
require_once '../php/config.php';

if (!isset($_SESSION['admin_id'])) {
    header("Location: admin_login.php");
    exit();
}

if (isset($_GET['logout'])) {
    session_unset();
    session_destroy();
    header("Location: admin_login.php");
    exit();
}

if (empty($_SESSION['csrf_token'])) {
    $_SESSION['csrf_token'] = bin2hex(random_bytes(32));
}

if (!isset($_GET['id']) || !is_numeric($_GET['id'])) die("Invalid Product ID");

$product_id = (int) $_GET['id'];
$stmt = $conn->prepare("SELECT * FROM products WHERE id = ?");
$stmt->bind_param("i", $product_id);
$stmt->execute();
$result = $stmt->get_result();
$product = $result->fetch_assoc();
if (!$product) die("Product not found");

$success_msg = '';
$error_msg = '';

if ($_SERVER['REQUEST_METHOD'] === 'POST') {
    if (!hash_equals($_SESSION['csrf_token'], $_POST['csrf_token'])) die("Invalid CSRF token");

    $name = trim($_POST['name']);
    $price = trim($_POST['price']);
    $description = trim($_POST['description']);

    if (empty($name) || empty($price)) $error_msg = "Name and Price are required.";
    elseif (!is_numeric($price) || $price < 0) $error_msg = "Price must be a positive number.";
    else {
        $image_name = $product['image'];
        if (!empty($_FILES['image']['name'])) {
            $upload_dir = "../assets/images/";
            $tmp_name = $_FILES['image']['tmp_name'];
            $ext = strtolower(pathinfo($_FILES['image']['name'], PATHINFO_EXTENSION));
            $allowed = ['jpg','jpeg','png','gif'];

            if (!in_array($ext, $allowed)) $error_msg = "Invalid image type. Allowed: jpg, png, gif.";
            else {
                $image_name = time() . "_" . basename($_FILES['image']['name']);
                move_uploaded_file($tmp_name, $upload_dir . $image_name);
            }
        }

        if (empty($error_msg)) {
            $stmt = $conn->prepare("UPDATE products SET name=?, price=?, description=?, image=? WHERE id=?");
            $stmt->bind_param("sdssi", $name, $price, $description, $image_name, $product_id);
            if ($stmt->execute()) {
                $success_msg = "Product updated successfully!";
                $product['name'] = $name;
                $product['price'] = $price;
                $product['description'] = $description;
                $product['image'] = $image_name;
            } else $error_msg = "Failed to update product.";
        }
    }
}
?>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
<meta charset="UTF-8">
<title>Edit Product - Woman Luxury</title>
<style>
body {
    font-family: "Segoe UI", Tahoma, sans-serif;
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
    background: linear-gradient(135deg, #0f2027, #203a43, #2c5364);
}

header {
    text-align: center;
    padding: 30px 0;
    color: #fff;
    font-size: 32px;
    font-weight: 800;
    letter-spacing: 3px;
    text-transform: uppercase;
}

.container {
    max-width: 600px;
    margin: 50px auto;
    background: #fff;
    border-radius: 15px;
    padding: 40px 35px;
    box-shadow: 0 15px 35px rgba(0,0,0,0.3);
    transition: transform 0.3s ease;
}

.container:hover {
    transform: translateY(-5px);
}

.top-buttons {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: space-between;
    margin-bottom: 25px;
    gap: 10px;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
}

.btn-nav {
    flex: 1;
    padding: 12px 18px;
    background: linear-gradient(90deg,#f472b6,#ec4899);
    color: #fff;
    border: none;
    border-radius: 10px;
    font-weight: 600;
    cursor: pointer;
    transition: all 0.3s ease;
    text-align: center;
}

.btn-nav:hover {
    background: linear-gradient(90deg,#ec4899,#db2777);
    transform: translateY(-2px);
}

    text-align: center;
    color: #db2777;
    margin-bottom: 25px;
    font-size: 26px;
    font-weight: 700;
}

    display: block;
    margin: 10px 0 5px;
    font-weight: 600;
    color: #334155;
}

form input[type="number"],
form textarea,
form input[type="file"] {
    width: 100%;

    margin-bottom: 15px;
    border-radius: 10px;
    border: 1px solid #cbd5e1;
    font-size: 15px;
    transition: all 0.3s ease;
}

form input:focus,
form textarea:focus,
form input[type="file"]:focus {
    border-color: #ec4899;
    box-shadow: 0 0 8px rgba(236,72,153,0.4);
    outline: none;
}

form textarea { resize: vertical; }

    width: 100%;

    background: linear-gradient(90deg,#f472b6,#ec4899);

    font-size: 16px;
    font-weight: 600;
    cursor: pointer;
    transition: all 0.3s ease;
}

.btn-primary:hover {
    background: linear-gradient(90deg,#ec4899,#db2777);
    transform: translateY(-2px);
}

.success {
    background: #22c55e;

    padding: 12px;
    border-radius: 10px;
    margin-bottom: 15px;
    text-align: center;
}

.error {
    background: #ef4444;
    color: #fff;
    padding: 12px;
    border-radius: 10px;
    margin-bottom: 15px;
    text-align: center;
}

    display: block;
    max-width: 220px;
    margin: 10px auto 15px;
    border-radius: 12px;
    border: 2px solid #e2e8f0;
    transition: transform 0.3s ease, box-shadow 0.3s ease;
}

img.product-image:hover {
    transform: scale(1.05);
    box-shadow: 0 8px 20px rgba(0,0,0,0.3);
}

    .container { margin: 20px; padding: 25px; }
    .top-buttons { flex-direction: column; }
    .btn-nav { width: 100%; }
}

    <button class="btn-nav" onclick="window.location.href='../index.php'">Logout</button>

Vous avez dit :
please the entire body shoul look like the luxurry pink
ChatGPT a dit :

Got it! 😎 You want the entire page to look like luxury pink, not just buttons and headings — so:

  • Background gradient: pink/purple luxury tones

  • Container/card: slightly lighter, soft white/pink with shadow

  • Buttons & accents: gradient pink/purple

  • All text & inputs: matching luxury feel

Here’s the fully luxury pink version for your Edit Single Product page:

php
<?php
session_start();
require_once '../php/config.php';

if (!isset($_SESSION['admin_id'])) {
    header("Location: admin_login.php");
    exit();
}

if (isset($_GET['logout'])) {
    session_unset();
    session_destroy();
    header("Location: admin_login.php");
    exit();
}

if (empty($_SESSION['csrf_token'])) {
    $_SESSION['csrf_token'] = bin2hex(random_bytes(32));
}

if (!isset($_GET['id']) || !is_numeric($_GET['id'])) die("Invalid Product ID");

$product_id = (int) $_GET['id'];
$stmt = $conn->prepare("SELECT * FROM products WHERE id = ?");
$stmt->bind_param("i", $product_id);
$stmt->execute();
$result = $stmt->get_result();
$product = $result->fetch_assoc();
if (!$product) die("Product not found");

$success_msg = '';
$error_msg = '';

if ($_SERVER['REQUEST_METHOD'] === 'POST') {
    if (!hash_equals($_SESSION['csrf_token'], $_POST['csrf_token'])) die("Invalid CSRF token");

    $name = trim($_POST['name']);
    $price = trim($_POST['price']);
    $description = trim($_POST['description']);

    if (empty($name) || empty($price)) $error_msg = "Name and Price are required.";
    elseif (!is_numeric($price) || $price < 0) $error_msg = "Price must be a positive number.";
    else {
        $image_name = $product['image'];
        if (!empty($_FILES['image']['name'])) {
            $upload_dir = "../assets/images/";
            $tmp_name = $_FILES['image']['tmp_name'];
            $ext = strtolower(pathinfo($_FILES['image']['name'], PATHINFO_EXTENSION));
            $allowed = ['jpg','jpeg','png','gif'];

            if (!in_array($ext, $allowed)) $error_msg = "Invalid image type. Allowed: jpg, png, gif.";
            else {
                $image_name = time() . "_" . basename($_FILES['image']['name']);
                move_uploaded_file($tmp_name, $upload_dir . $image_name);
            }
        }

        if (empty($error_msg)) {
            $stmt = $conn->prepare("UPDATE products SET name=?, price=?, description=?, image=? WHERE id=?");
            $stmt->bind_param("sdssi", $name, $price, $description, $image_name, $product_id);
            if ($stmt->execute()) {
                $success_msg = "Product updated successfully!";
                $product['name'] = $name;
                $product['price'] = $price;
                $product['description'] = $description;
                $product['image'] = $image_name;
            } else $error_msg = "Failed to update product.";
        }
    }
}
?>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
<meta charset="UTF-8">
<title>Edit Product - Luxury Pink</title>
<style>
/* ================== Luxury Pink Style ================== */
body {
    font-family: "Segoe UI", Tahoma, sans-serif;
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
    background: linear-gradient(135deg,#f9a8d4,#ec4899,#be185d);
    min-height: 100vh;
}

header {
    text-align: center;
    padding: 40px 0;
    color: #fff;
    font-size: 36px;
    font-weight: 900;
    letter-spacing: 3px;
    text-transform: uppercase;
    text-shadow: 2px 2px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.3);
}

.container {
    max-width: 600px;
    margin: 30px auto 50px;
    background: rgba(255,255,255,0.95);
    border-radius: 20px;
    padding: 45px 35px;
    box-shadow: 0 20px 50px rgba(0,0,0,0.35);
    transition: transform 0.3s ease, box-shadow 0.3s ease;
}

.container:hover {
    transform: translateY(-5px);
    box-shadow: 0 25px 60px rgba(0,0,0,0.45);
}

.top-buttons {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: space-between;
    margin-bottom: 25px;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    gap: 10px;
}

.btn-nav {
    flex: 1;
    padding: 12px 18px;
    background: linear-gradient(90deg,#f9a8d4,#ec4899,#be185d);
    color: #fff;
    border: none;
    border-radius: 12px;
    font-weight: 700;
    cursor: pointer;
    transition: all 0.3s ease;
    text-align: center;
}

.btn-nav:hover {
    background: linear-gradient(90deg,#ec4899,#be185d,#9d174d);
    transform: translateY(-2px);
}

h2 {
    text-align: center;
    color: #be185d;
    margin-bottom: 25px;
    font-size: 28px;
    font-weight: 800;
}

form label {
    display: block;
    margin: 12px 0 6px;
    font-weight: 600;
    color: #4b5563;
}

form input[type="text"],
form input[type="number"],
form textarea,
form input[type="file"] {
    width: 100%;
    padding: 14px;
    margin-bottom: 18px;
    border-radius: 12px;
    border: 1px solid #f9a8d4;
    font-size: 15px;
    transition: all 0.3s ease;
}

form input:focus,
form textarea:focus,
form input[type="file"]:focus {
    border-color: #ec4899;
    box-shadow: 0 0 12px rgba(236,72,153,0.4);
    outline: none;
}

form textarea { resize: vertical; }

.btn-primary {
    width: 100%;
    padding: 16px;
    background: linear-gradient(90deg,#f9a8d4,#ec4899,#be185d);
    color: #fff;
    border: none;
    border-radius: 12px;
    font-size: 16px;
    font-weight: 700;
    cursor: pointer;
    transition: all 0.3s ease;
}

.btn-primary:hover {
    background: linear-gradient(90deg,#ec4899,#be185d,#9d174d);
    transform: translateY(-2px);
}

.success {
    background: #22c55e;
    color: #fff;
    padding: 12px;
    border-radius: 12px;
    margin-bottom: 15px;
    text-align: center;
}

.error {
    background: #ef4444;
    color: #fff;
    padding: 12px;
    border-radius: 12px;
    margin-bottom: 15px;
    text-align: center;
}

img.product-image {
    display: block;
    max-width: 220px;
    margin: 15px auto 20px;
    border-radius: 15px;
    border: 2px solid #f9a8d4;
    transition: transform 0.3s ease, box-shadow 0.3s ease;
}

img.product-image:hover {
    transform: scale(1.05);
    box-shadow: 0 10px 25px rgba(0,0,0,0.35);
}

@media (max-width: 640px) {
    .container { margin: 20px; padding: 30px; }
    .top-buttons { flex-direction: column; }
    .btn-nav { width: 100%; }
}
</style>

<div class="container">

<div class="top-buttons">
    <button class="btn-nav" onclick="window.location.href='admin_dashboard.php'">← Dashboard</button>
    <button class="btn-nav" onclick="window.location.href='edit_product.php'">← Edit Products</button>
    <button class="btn-nav" onclick="window.location.href='../index.php'">Logout</button>
</div>

<h2>Edit Product</h2>

<?php if ($success_msg): ?>
    <div class="success"><?= htmlspecialchars($success_msg) ?></div>
<?php endif; ?>

<?php if ($error_msg): ?>
    <div class="error"><?= htmlspecialchars($error_msg) ?></div>
<?php endif; ?>

<form method="POST" enctype="multipart/form-data">
    <label for="name">Product Name</label>
    <input type="text" name="name" id="name" value="<?= htmlspecialchars($product['name']) ?>" required>

    <label for="price">Price ($)</label>
    <input type="number" step="0.01" name="price" id="price" value="<?= htmlspecialchars($product['price']) ?>" required>

    <label for="description">Description</label>
    <textarea name="description" id="description" rows="4"><?= htmlspecialchars($product['description']) ?></textarea>

    <label for="image">Product Image</label>
    <input type="file" name="image" id="image">
    <?php if ($product['image']): ?>
        <img class="product-image" src="../assets/images/<?= htmlspecialchars($product['image']) ?>" alt="Product Image">
    <?php endif; ?>

    <button type="submit" class="btn-primary">Update Product</button>
</form>

  • Full pink/purple luxury gradient for background, buttons, and card accents

  • Shadows and hover effects for a premium feel

  • Rounded inputs, smooth focus effects in pink

Vous avez dit :
<?php session_start(); include '../php/config.php'; //Prevent caching to disable browser back button header("Cache-Control: no-store, no-cache, must-revalidate, max-age=0"); header("Cache-Control: post-check=0, pre-check=0", false); header("Pragma: no-cache"); // Redirect to login/index if not logged in if (!isset($_SESSION['user_id']) && !isset($_SESSION['admin_id'])) { header("Location: index.php"); exit(); } // Logout action if (isset($_GET['logout'])) { session_unset(); session_destroy(); header("Location: index.php"); exit(); } // Check admin session if(!isset($_SESSION['admin_id'])){ header("Location: admin_login.php"); exit(); } // Fetch all products $result = $conn->query("SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY id DESC"); // Delete product if(isset($_GET['delete'])){ $id = intval($_GET['delete']); $conn->query("DELETE FROM products WHERE id=$id"); header("Location: edit_product.php"); exit(); } ?> <!DOCTYPE html> <html lang="en"> <head> <meta charset="UTF-8"> <title>Edit Products - Admin</title> <link rel="stylesheet" href="../assets/css/dashboard.css"> <link rel="stylesheet" href="../assets/css/style.css"> </head> <body> <header> <div class="header-container"> <h1>ALOLLUXX AFRICA Admin</h1> <nav> <a href="admin_dashboard.php" class="btn btn-primary">Back to Dashboard</a> <a href="../index.php" class="btn btn-primary">Logout</a> </nav> </div> </header> <section class="dashboard-products"> <h2>Edit / Delete Products</h2> <div class="products-container"> <?php while($product = $result->fetch_assoc()): ?> <div class="product-card"> <img src="../assets/images/<?php echo $product['image']; ?>" alt="<?php echo $product['name']; ?>"> <h3><?php echo $product['name']; ?></h3> <p>$<?php echo number_format($product['price'],2); ?></p> <div class="product-buttons"> <a href="edit_single_product.php?id=<?php echo $product['id']; ?>" class="btn btn-details">Edit</a> <a href="edit_product.php?delete=<?php echo $product['id']; ?>" class="btn btn-cart" onclick="return confirm('Delete this product?')">Delete</a> </div> </div> <?php endwhile; ?> </div> </section> </body> </html> the same to this more nicer
ChatGPT a dit :

Perfect! You want the Edit/Delete Products page to match the luxury pink aesthetic we applied to the single product page. That means:

  • Full pink/purple gradient background

  • Product cards with soft white/pink backgrounds, rounded corners, shadow, hover effects

  • Buttons in luxury pink gradient with smooth hover transitions

  • Maintain all functionality (edit/delete) and content

Here’s the fully redesigned luxury pink version for edit_product.php:

php
<?php
session_start();
include '../php/config.php';

//Prevent caching to disable browser back button
header("Cache-Control: no-store, no-cache, must-revalidate, max-age=0");
header("Cache-Control: post-check=0, pre-check=0", false);
header("Pragma: no-cache");

// Redirect to login/index if not logged in
if (!isset($_SESSION['user_id']) && !isset($_SESSION['admin_id'])) {
    header("Location: index.php");
    exit();
}

// Logout action
if (isset($_GET['logout'])) {
    session_unset();
    session_destroy();
    header("Location: index.php");
    exit();
}

// Check admin session
if(!isset($_SESSION['admin_id'])){
    header("Location: admin_login.php");
    exit();
}

// Fetch all products
$result = $conn->query("SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY id DESC");

// Delete product
if(isset($_GET['delete'])){
    $id = intval($_GET['delete']);
    $conn->query("DELETE FROM products WHERE id=$id");
    header("Location: edit_product.php");
    exit();
}
?>

<!DOCTYPE html>

            <img src="../assets/images/<?php echo $product['image']; ?>" alt="<?php echo $product['name']; ?>">
            <h3><?php echo $product['name']; ?></h3>
            <p>$<?php echo number_format($product['price'],2); ?></p>
            <div class="product-buttons">
                <a href="edit_single_product.php?id=<?php echo $product['id']; ?>" class="btn-details">Edit</a>
                <a href="edit_product.php?delete=<?php echo $product['id']; ?>" class="btn-cart" onclick="return confirm('Delete this product?')">Delete</a>
            </div>
        </div>
        <?php endwhile; ?>
    </div>
</section>

ChatGPT a dit :

Got it! You want your Admin Dashboard to be fully working and styled in a luxury pink/woman-themed style, consistent with your other pages. I’ve fixed your PHP session logic, logout, and added pink gradient styling, luxury fonts, rounded buttons, and a responsive layout.

Here’s the complete working version:

php
<?php
session_start();

// Prevent caching
header("Cache-Control: no-store, no-cache, must-revalidate, max-age=0");
header("Cache-Control: post-check=0, pre-check=0", false);
header("Pragma: no-cache");

// Redirect if not logged in
if (!isset($_SESSION['admin_id'])) {
    header("Location: ../index.php");
    exit();
}

// Logout
if (isset($_GET['logout'])) {
    session_unset();
    session_destroy();
    header("Location: ../index.php");
    exit();
}
?>
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
<meta charset="UTF-8">
<title>Admin Dashboard - Luxury Pink</title>
<style>
/* ================== Luxury Pink Admin Dashboard ================== */
body {
    font-family: "Segoe UI", Tahoma, sans-serif;
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
    background: linear-gradient(135deg,#f9a8d4,#ec4899,#be185d);
    min-height: 100vh;
    color: #fff;
}

    text-shadow: 2px 2px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.25);
}

    margin-top: 20px;
}

    display: inline-block;
    margin: 10px 15px;

    font-weight: 700;
    border-radius: 12px;
    text-decoration: none;
    transition: all 0.3s ease;
}

    background: linear-gradient(90deg,#f43f5e,#e11d48,#be185d);
}

    transform: translateY(-2px);
    box-shadow: 0 8px 20px rgba(0,0,0,0.3);
}

    text-align: center;
    margin: 60px auto;
    max-width: 600px;

    padding: 40px 30px;
    border-radius: 20px;

}

    window.history.pushState(null, "", window.location.href);
    window.onpopstate = function () {
        window.history.pushState(null, "", window.location.href);
    };
})();
</script>
